title: My sister is unfortunately a bookmark female stereotype.
body:
She's mad that nobody helps her. When she never asks anyone for help. And does things nobody asked her to do.

So she called her fiance to complain about how he doesn't help her with these things.

And whenever he tried to say anything back. She's just start yelling at him and telling him to shut up.

Then she tries to end the call because she felt like it was just her talking.

I really don't think we're related.
